segments.text: Looking at this drawing, I see a peaceful daytime kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back, letting in the light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman focuses intently on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly to her side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the faucet runs unchecked, causing overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damages the cabinets as it flows down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor grows silently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up to help or receive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent adventure ignores the hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR
